name: swap_all_lights_for_new_definition
display_name: Swap All Lights For New Definition
modeler_description: For now I will hard code three options roughly equivalent to incandescent, fluorescent, and LED. Later will have external data source.
description: This will use a new lights definition for all lights that use a lighting power with a user selected lighting definition. This won't alter lights that have per area or per person value.
